website_summaries.verdict: Durable and stable, these steel ladder ball posts hold up toss after toss, game after game.
pros: Bolas are constructed from soft, strong material to help prevent injuries
Comes with bag for carrying and storage
cons: Some of the bolas leak sand over time

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy metal design with case that will last, but balls will break
customer_reviews.text: Well built frame. Bought it for my grandpa and he loves it. We bust it out at all the family gatherings now. Unlike most ladderball games, this one is metal, so it won't crack and will last a long time. However, after just a few uses on grass, one of the balls has a small split and is slowly leaking sand. We can always make some more legit ones with golfballs, but it's kind of annoying how this thing is such a great quality with a nice carrying case and the balls break so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Duke

customer_reviews.title: Metal is the way to go
customer_reviews.text: So much fun! Definitely glad we shelled out for the metal frame version instead of the plastic one. This held up over the summer and through multiple uses, by both adults and children. Worth the cash, and one of our favorite things to do outside. Very easy to put together and take apart—I don't know if we just got lucky (I think some other reviewers had serious issues with this aspect), but we've never had a problem setting up or taking down. It's maybe a little tricky fitting everything back in the bag right the first time, but it's easy enough to adjust and make work.
customer_reviews.author: K. S.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GAME
customer_reviews.text: After having been through two or three of these in plastic, I decided it was time to check on a metal one or just break down and build my own. Found this one and upon arrival, I assembled it in about 10-15 minutes. So far, so good. Seems very sturdy and stable. Though it come with a bag for storage and travel, we usually leave one assembled all summer and leave it in the camper. We pretty much spend the majority of the weekends at the lake anyway and definitely all the holiday weekends there. We'll see how this holds up and will edit later if needed.
customer_reviews.author: RLD 1427Top Contributor: Welding

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy -- and fun
customer_reviews.text: I had planned to make my own ladder ball game from PVC pipe but then had second thoughts when I saw this game. Its metal construction and larger base makes it quite sturdy. There's almost no give when it is struck. Delivery took a long time, as expected. I'm quite happy with the purchase and I think it will hold up to rigorous use. I made my own cornhole game, but it makes more sense to purchase this one.
customer_reviews.author: Coeus

customer_reviews.title: Get this set and some new Bolas.
customer_reviews.text: The ladders are great quality while the bag is closer to average quality with a crap zipper. The Bolas that come with the set like to fly apart when you throw them so be careful not to lose them.
customer_reviews.author: Slayals

customer_reviews.title: Toss the corn hole!
customer_reviews.text: We used a plastic ladderball for years and had to tape-up corners or find replacement PVC pipes as they broke. We finally broke down and bought this set when the balls on our old ladderball split from age. We should have made the switch a long time ago. This set is so much more stable and professional-looking. The storage bag is very convenient and fits all of the parts easily. Portable games like these are classic and entertain kids and adults for hours at a picnic, party, or just for practice in the backyard. It's way more transportable than corn hole but can be just as much fun and competitive.
customer_reviews.author: ecember

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Light-weight, and East to Assemble! Also, a great game!
customer_reviews.text: I had a flimsy, plastic ladderball set that wore out after two years of play, and I wanted a sturdier set. This one is it! It is so well constructed, solid and sturdy; and yet light-weight and easy to assemble. We love the game: our small grandchildren, grown children, and we old folks all enjoy it in the summertime, and I expect this set will last for many years!
customer_reviews.author: Lorena

customer_reviews.title: One hole was not drilled straight in the upright.
customer_reviews.text: So overall im pretty, kind of, sort of happy with the set. IT IS STURDY! set up is pretty easy however.... one of my red rods/uprights does NOT line up to get the bolt through the hole. I could re-drill the post to get it to line up but i don't have too. With the other 5 bolts in place missing the one don't effect game play.
customer_reviews.author: Lunacy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but pain to set up
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if I just have a defective set, but this is a pain to set up. The screws don't thread well into the black base legs. I've had 4 other friends set this up on different occasions who noticed the same. Seems like this should be much simpler. This is also a pretty heavy set of pieces. The zipper on the bag broke the first summer of use. On the positive side, the racks are sturdy once you have them set up.
customer_reviews.author: Janine Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Very well built.
customer_reviews.text: This particular Ladderball set is very well built and very sturdy. It's also very easy to assemble. The set has survived 2, 3, and 4 year old children climbing on it without tipping or scratching it up. I'm very pleased with it. My only concern, although not a real concern, is the soft balls that come with it. I will purchase real golf balls to replace them when the time comes. Overall, I'm very pleased with this game set.
customer_reviews.author: Montana Man 1

customer_reviews.title: Solid and quality item
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great about this item except for one thing; The balls wear out quickly (sandy material falls out where the cord goes in) but the good news is the rest of it is high quality and solid. One can expect needing to replace the Corded balls sooner than later.
customer_reviews.author: John F

customer_reviews.title: I really like this set
customer_reviews.text: I really like this set. We bought a set at our local store but took it back. This one is heavy duty and stands up to the kids. I purchased this one because it had a carry bag. We carry the set back and forth to the lake. I think my only complaint is that the bag arrived with a broken zipper and is unusable. I've tried to contact the company through Amazon but have not had any luck. I do not want to return the entire set, we use it to much! Just wish I could get them to send me a new bag. Other than the bag the set is great !
customer_reviews.author: Hockeymom6

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a High Quality Ladderball Set!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent build quality. We tried other models from other brands that were made of plastic and all were cheap or fell apart quickly. This model by Maranda is solid with an all-metal construction. Assembly is not difficult and it disassembles back to pieces to be stored within the included bag. All screws are thumb screws so no tools are necessary. My only complaint is that the actual bolos are cheap and actually leak sand after a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Miech

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty ladders
customer_reviews.text: Really sturdy but removing a star due to its lack of really being able to travel with it. Really heavy....
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting!
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend and I had a cheap plastic ladder ball that kept breaking. We decided to spend the money to buy something that will last and we weren't disappointed. These are very sturdy, yet very easy to assemble and disassemble. The carry case is also great for taking them to a friends house or tailgate. We've had them about a year now and they still look good. Do not over tighten the screws on the bars though. You will end up deforming them and they will be hard to get in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Lee Hein

customer_reviews.title: Low quality.
customer_reviews.text: Set comes with plastic balls and the metal dents really easy. Not a quality product in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: James McClure

customer_reviews.title: Quality set - Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made set. well worth the extra money vs. the pvc pipe style game. I had no problems putting it together. The pre-drilled holes were right on. Will last a long time, as long as taken care of and keep out of the weather when not in use. Carrying case could be a little more heavy duty, but works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Joe - Everett, WA

customer_reviews.title: Relatively easy to set up (I had a little trouble getting ...
customer_reviews.text: Relatively easy to set up (I had a little trouble getting the poles into the bottom stand, until I took out the rubber piece, put it on the pole, then placed it in the stand). Very sturdy. I like that it comes with a carrying case, but I don't plan to use it much as I bought it for us to use at home, and it is easier to just leave it set up instead of having to put it together for a few minutes of play.
customer_reviews.author: Katie G

customer_reviews.title: A much needed upgrade for all your parties.
customer_reviews.text: A very high quality product that is going to withstand the test of time. I had a very cheap plastic version that was more tape than plastic, but I will definitely not have that problem with this. EVERYTHING is metal (except the balls, of course) and is designed to be easily taken apart and stored. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder ball set!
customer_reviews.text: Great ladder ball set! Big hit at 4th of July party for both kids and adults. Sturdy frame with easy assembly. Game balls are well made and evenly balanced. I do suggest ordering extra balls if you play around trees and have children or overzealous adult throwers!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S.

customer_reviews.title: So happy with the metal one!
customer_reviews.text: I went back and forth for weeks, agonizing over whether to spend the extra money on a metal ladderball set and as soon as I got this one, was so happy with my choice! I plan on keeping it up and outside most of the year, so the metal one should have been a no brainer! My kids have played with inside since Christmas because it's been so cold, but it's awesome! And I'm so happy I don't have to worry about them breaking it! The balls are good and easy for them to handle. My kids are 3 and 6 and have a lot of fun with this!
customer_reviews.author: jax

customer_reviews.title: HEAVY DUTY
customer_reviews.text: This solid metal Ladderball Game has convenient wing nut screws. While a little more expensive than the flimsy plastic versions of the same game, it is worth the extra money. This metal Game will last a lifetime. A neighbor bought a plastic ladderball for half what I paid for this Maranda. The neighbor is already to throw away her plastic ladderball, because the cross bars are all split up. She tried to duct tape the ends together, without much success.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Small

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, very sturdy and very fun! After playing ladderball with my husband's aunt and uncle, I knew I had to get a set for our family! Hubby's aunt warned us not to waste $$ on a plastic version, so when I found this metal set for an amazing price, I just had to order it! It's a great game for kids and adults to play and has been at the center of hours and hours of fun at our house! Would definitely buy again! :D
customer_reviews.author: Summerland

customer_reviews.title: We love it. Made of metal so it's very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is our third Ladder Ball Set. We love it. Made of metal so it's very sturdy! Great bag to store. Sets up very easy. The only thing we don't like is we had to write our own numbers on the side to keep score - but it was worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Ann Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Buy this if you want the best.
customer_reviews.text: Heavier to carry than others BUT this has lasted us longer and never blows or falls over when using. We have put it together many times and it stands up to much use and abuse for an active family who travels taking outdoor games. You will never buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: fun
customer_reviews.text: fun game, however this one is a bit cheaper than the one i intended to get since the balls are a deflated rubber vs the hard ones that ive seen before
customer_reviews.author: Glenn L

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fun game, well constructed, good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Fun game. Took it out on a tailgate. Pretty easy to setup. Every one had fun. Probably one of the better built Ladderball games out there. Did not tip over once. Comes in a case that's easy to throw over your shoulder and back in the trunk. Pay attention to how the components came out of the case to ease your frustration with getting everything back in order so you can zip the case up when you're done.
customer_reviews.author: evh347

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing, heavy duty and the balls are perfect
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing, heavy duty and the balls are perfect; I ordered a similar product, which was 10.00 less and returned it immediately because it was cheaply made. Do yourself a favor and pay the extra $10.00 and you'll be happy! Hint: order an extra 6 balls (3 red and 3 blue) and its more fun when playing with four people.
customer_reviews.author: Kolani

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set-Would purchase again if ever needed, or maybe for a gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty set and would recommend it to anyone wanting to purchase a ladder ball game. We used it extensively over July 4th, weekend and it worked very well and did not move around when the bolas hit the bars or frame. It comes with a carry case also, which makes it nice for storage between usage.TS
customer_reviews.author: T. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome game
customer_reviews.text: After reading many reviews on Amazon I decided to purchase this game and was not disappointed. It is extremely sturdy and easy to put together. It is great to have the bag in case we travel but I think we will mostly use it at home. I bought this for a graduation party and it was a big hit with the gang. It is heavy and seems like it will be sturdy enough to hold up under rugged conditions. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: C. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: NO SCORE KEEPER
customer_reviews.text: OVERALL IT IS OK. STURDY BUT DOESN'T HAVE A SCORE KEEPER BUILT INTO IT LIKE ALL OF OUR PREVIOUS LADDER BALL GAMES SO THAT WAS THE BIGGEST DRAWBACK.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Cutshall

customer_reviews.title: solid construct, and soft balls are perfect for smaller children.
customer_reviews.text: solid, all metal construction and soft sand filled balls make this perfect for my family of 4 kids under 10. We had a part with over 20 kids, and these stood the test, and cause minimal damage if someone (or something) gets hit. Comes with a travel case that holds everything well too. I will recommend if you get this to keep the box in your travel bag for sturdy storage.
customer_reviews.author: Bobula

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bit tricky to put together but quality is great. look forward to using this at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Family Entertainment!
customer_reviews.text: Received product quickly. One screwthread was problematic, no problem....called customer service @ Maranda Enterprises and received a replacement 4 days later. The delightful customer service lady was so cheerful and apologetic. WOW! Thanks Miranda for making a sturdy, easy to assemble, family FUN metal ladderball game with durable tote bag. I kept the cardboard box and dividers to slide into the tote bag to keep items organized & looking new. If you have children and there are trees within sight of your play area, go ahead, buy some replacement balls when you purchase game. It'll save you some tree climbing anguish. In economics today this metal enjoyable outdoor game is well worth the extra money spent over the plastic versions.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent set but star deducted for inaccurate description
customer_reviews.text: This set is excellent. A couple of years I bought a cheap plastic Ladderball set and I reached the point where I was tired of taping the plastic pipes as they split. This metal set should be just the ticket! As of this writing, please note that the Amazon description says this set is 6 pounds. The set is actually over 23 pounds according to the stamp on the package. It's for this reason, only, that I deducted one star.
customer_reviews.author: MarkSD

customer_reviews.title: Buy this! Skip the Plastic One.
customer_reviews.text: We bought the plastic version of this product first and it fell apart, so it was instantly returned (see our other review). We spent the extra money for the metal one and WOW was it worth it. The ladders will not fall apart and will last forever (As long as you put them in when it rains)! We are so happy with this purchase. It's such a fun game and any age can play.
customer_reviews.author: BirdingIt

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: We loved everything about this product. We had never played before but the reviews on the plastic ones made this worth the few extra dollars. All of our guest, both young and old, loved playing. Definitely happy and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Zoey

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: Good strong set. Large screws keep it from coming apart like other set do. Well worth the extra expense.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Bos

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and heavy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and heavy! These doesn’t break as quickly as the usual plastic stuff. Come in a handy bag. Perhaps the only issue is that because they are so sturdy it takes 5-10 Minutes to put all pieces together and set it up, it’s also very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny! Great product and fun game!
customer_reviews.text: Very solid product. I've played this game many times on home made PVC pipes and this set blows them away. Good price and I like the fact that it's easy to assemble and disassemble and take with you in the provided bag. The throwing balls are a rubberized soft type so if you like the traditional hard golf ball you will have to buy those separately. Other than that this set is great.
customer_reviews.author: Chris1683

customer_reviews.title: Best deal out here!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before buying a ladderball set for my husband for Father's Day. After reading a ton of reviews, this set began to really stand out above all others in its price range. Once we got the set, I knew I made the right choice. It was SO easy to set up, and it is SO STURDY! Don't skimp and get a plastic set to save a few bucks. This set feels and looks twice its price and will last so much longer!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith L Parker

customer_reviews.title: Best game ever!
customer_reviews.text: This game was so much fun! We had a BBQ a couple weeks ago and all the adults LOVED IT! We bought an extra set of bola's so that we could have two couples (4 people) play at the same time. The bolas are soft but heavy enough to wrap themselves around the ladder. This was brilliant because we would have a couple broken windows if they were anything by plastic sand filled bola's. We'll be taking this game to a 4th of July BBQ this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: D.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great game! Well constructed and attractive.
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed and attractive. Love the fact that the balls are softer than golf balls but yet the correct weight. Replaces our old home-made set of PVC piping and golf balls. It's a real step up!
customer_reviews.author: Mak

customer_reviews.title: Great summer game to play with the entire family
customer_reviews.text: I own this set and have bought it for 2 other people. It is well built and for the price is quite honestly a steal. Great summer game to play with the entire family!
customer_reviews.author: John EG

customer_reviews.title: Great frame bad balls
customer_reviews.text: I didn't read the "soft ball" part. Great for liability, bad for the game. Once you've played with hard bolas you'll never go back. I made a set out of golf balls. Ain't nobody got time for that! ... at least give an option. I love the construction and durability of the frame but knowing what I know now, would not have bought the set. My advice .... Upgrade to the oak set with hard Bolas.
customer_reviews.author: TOBY

customer_reviews.title: The Ladder Ball set you should have
customer_reviews.text: Throw out the plastic junk set you have and get this one. Set is awesome and sturdy. Doesn't move when you play, like at all! Had a minor issue with my set and contacted the seller. They responded right away and sent out the replacement parts i needed without question. I will recommend this set and seller to everyone i know.
customer_reviews.author: EBeet

customer_reviews.title: No issues whatsoever!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, easy to assemble/disassemble. Real golf balls WILL leave very small dents, but NOT an issue - especially compared with wood!
customer_reviews.author: SaintChuck

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together as well
customer_reviews.text: This is a very solid set. I've played with some of the cheaper versions and half the time we're re-positioning the stand cause our tosses push it around. Not with this set! Easy to put together as well. Love playing this with the family!
customer_reviews.author: JAK

customer_reviews.title: The BEST Ladder Ball Set... You will NOT Regret Buying This.!
customer_reviews.text: The absolute BEST Ladder Ball Set available. Don't waste your money on the plastic sets. This is high quality steel material. This set will outlast all of the others. It's sturdy and worked well for our 16 year old and his friends. They can dish out the torture on a product and this has done a great job. I'm so glad we found this. Sucha great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Big Rig

customer_reviews.title: It's super short!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely sturdy, but it's so short compared to the standard sized ladderball game. Too late to return I guess; we opened it at camp and we were too bored to not use.
customer_reviews.author: Orange533

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: Love the metal ladder all set. Very sturdy and the storage bag is a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Golfingmom62

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and well constructed ....should last for years. That said, I did have to contact Maranda Enterprises and have them send me one replacement bar. The original one was misthreaded. They complied quickly. I was worried I would not like the plastic bolos, but they are great.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Morton

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy frame, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy metallic frame, much better than the plastic alternatives. Simple set-up, and the travel bag is a nice addition as well. My one complaint is that the rope connecting the balls is already fraying after only a few days of play.
customer_reviews.author: C1928

customer_reviews.title: Great Family Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Saw some kids playing this on the beach and had to try it. This product is sturdy metal, very well made. Avoid the cheaper, wooden models, they won't last. Inventive scoring system and we added a twist. Hit 21 exactly to win but if you go over, get busted back to 15. Adds a strategy component and keeps games close and exciting. For the smaller kids, bring the ladders closer than the regulation 25 feet and it will be fun for the entire family!
customer_reviews.author: william metzger

customer_reviews.title: Ladder ball set
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for five years now still in perfect condition, great buy. Very sturdy will not fall down .
customer_reviews.author: DENNIS  E  CALLAHAN

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and well made. Worth every dollar extra to finally find a game that isn’t made of plastic!
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a lot of different Ladderball Game sets before purchasing this one and I made the right decision. I have two sons who have played the game a lot and it has maintained its quality. It's easy to assemble and disassemble, and the carrying case is easy to store. Look no further if you want a high-quality Ladderball Game that is also affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Ansley Cox

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty....long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty. I was surprised to feel how heavy these were. Great buy because they seem like a better quality for a cheaper price than what I found at some of the sporting goods stores. These have seen two summers worth of use and don't show any signs of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We are obsessed with this! Bought this after a friend recommended it. I had never played before. So much fun! I love this set because it's so sturdy and classic looking. Would definitely recommend this set over the options available! I'm glad I chose this one!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea N

customer_reviews.title: Look no further...this is the set.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this set for over 10 years and it is still ticking. Great durability and portability.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality
customer_reviews.text: This game is a lot of fun, and the construction is top quality. I am very impressed with the quality of this game. My old one was made of PVC pipe and was constantly coming apart. This one is made of steel and is very sturdy. It is very easy to assemble, or take down to travel with. I would recommend this to anyone who loves ladderball!
customer_reviews.author: Banancheck

customer_reviews.title: Super durable, much better than the crap PVC version.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 3 PVC versions of this game and inevitably something happens - it's destroyed by a lawn mower, or a toddler niece or nephew, or the sprinklers and sunshine wear down the pipe and it cracks, we aren't great at putting it away between uses... This one made it through an entire summer and is still going strong. I am really happy with the construction. This is the way to go.... Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: asundahl

customer_reviews.title: very well built
customer_reviews.text: Like some of the other people who have reviewed this, I initially bought one of the cheap plastic versions for the kids. It broke on the second use and I got my money back. This model is built to last! Very easy to assemble w/o tools and you could practically do chin-ups on the thing, it's so sturdy. I'm impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Dave U.

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my teenage daughter's birthday party to have something for them to do and they had a blast, even though my daughter was skeptical and thought no one would want to play. Very well made and easy to put together. It's fun and I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane H.

customer_reviews.title: Great item. Well made
customer_reviews.text: Great item. Well made. Easy to construct and easy to put back in bag after use. Didn't care for the rubber balls. I bought other balls to go with the set.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sitterson

customer_reviews.title: this metal one is by far the best built one yet
customer_reviews.text: This ladder game worth the money I spent on it. We have frequent outdoor family gatherings and it has always been as popular as horse shoes. The problem with the ones we have had in the past is the PVC and the wooden ones depreciate quickly with frequent use, this metal one is by far the best built one yet.
customer_reviews.author: Nick N.

customer_reviews.title: Cation, this game is addictive.
customer_reviews.text: Well built and lots of fun. You will be addicted to this game!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Steiner

customer_reviews.title: Maranda- Metal Ladderball Game
customer_reviews.text: Received this game promptly, packaged well and designed/built well. Strong material, weighed 23 lbs. Base, uprights and crossbar are steel. Went together quickly with no design of mfg. flaws. Thumb-Twist bolts stay tight, all holes aligned, good finish. Sturdy. We enjoy the product. Good value! Instructions and game rules encluded. Would buy again. Kenny K and Donna
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth E. Kinnear

customer_reviews.title: Best Ladderball Set Ever!
customer_reviews.text: We have owned 3 other ladderball sets that cost around $20 each in the past and they all fell apart within weeks. This one is amazing and very durable. Definitely worth the price! We had just one issue with the set so far -- a little bit of difficulty screwing in one of the rungs. However, some WD-40 and elbow grease solved the problem. Still very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Need to buy a spare set of bolas with this game set
customer_reviews.text: I wish that bolas would be the same quality as the ladders. The bolas are a sphere with a plug and the string is attached to the plug. After just three games plugs started to come out. Now I need to look for new bolas to continue enjoying the game. When all works, the game is a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: DMITRIY S.

customer_reviews.title: Good ladder ball set up... weight of equipment is solid and somewhat heavy
customer_reviews.text: Well built but be aware this isn't a light set of metal bars but build to last. Can pull apart for trips and use... but does weigh a lot if carried. Definitely a great game and solid parts and pieces. If you enjoy Ladder Ball this is definitely a well designed and buit set up.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Reliable!
customer_reviews.text: This set is the most sturdy set I've ever played on. I absolutely love it! It does not have a score keeping system like some of the plastic ones, so I rated it only 4 stores. Takes some time to set up and take down, but that's okay. Still amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Baylea Sorto

customer_reviews.title: Built for play; built to last
customer_reviews.text: If you're going to buy a ladder golf set - as opposed to building your own - this is the one to buy. Easy to assemble; rock-solid; satisfying bolas (I prefer the included soft, hefty, rubber bolas to the hard golf ball bolas that come with with lower-quality sets). It's a pleasure to play ladder golf without worrying if your next throw is going to make the ladder fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Moons

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Fun game and this particular one is sturdy unlike the plastic pipe ones.
customer_reviews.author: Starla M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my son. He is now excited for summer and next fall's tailgate season.
customer_reviews.author: Howlisa

customer_reviews.title: Too Heavy to Transport
customer_reviews.text: Way too heavy for a portable game. Returned because the use of carrying it around would not be practical.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it. You won't get hurt if you're pegged ...
customer_reviews.text: High quality. Love it. You won't get hurt if you're pegged by a ball. Also, the ladder won't tip over with a strong throw or wind.
customer_reviews.author: Janel J

customer_reviews.title: Rather impressed with quality
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded to this product from an all plastic that degraded in sunlight. Should provide many years of use!!
customer_reviews.author: mm08822

customer_reviews.title: best quality ladders I've ever played on
customer_reviews.text: The build quality of this setup is awesome. My only beef with it is, I don't really like the included balls. They're not cheap or anything, they're just different from other ones we've played with I guess. I guess you could get new ones if you don't like the feel of these. I wouldn't, they're fine really, I'm just being persnickety. The ladders themselves though are stout. Such a fun game!
customer_reviews.author: bizzeler78

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have friends who have this set. It is well built.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got it right the second time.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon was kind enough to accept the return on the (crappy) Eddie Bauer ladder ball set my daughter got me for Father's Day...the set which broke in two places within five minutes of attempting to play it. We ordered this one, for basically the same money, and it is solid and well designed. (Pretty easy to put together and take apart, too.) I'm not a fan of the rubber "golf ball" bolos, so we use an extra set of the real ones we'd bought for our first ladder ball game, and all is well. Nice carrying case; great game!
customer_reviews.author: Philip Van Munching

customer_reviews.title: Great family gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a Christmas gift for a large family that I can never think of gifts for. They have raved about it every time I have seen them! Great for kids and adults and seems to be holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Mungeer

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy construction!
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy construction! Don't get the plastic set, since it cracks within a small timeframe. Worth the extra money for this all-metal construction. Strings on balls get a bit dirty; too bad they aren't black.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: Fun game, very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The game is fun and a lot more challenging than you'd expect. Delivery was prompt. The parts are very sturdy and will last a long time. I'd highly recommend paying up for this model than cheaping out and buying the plastic version that breaks with the first use.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality set. The only thing it’s missing is an integrated scorekeeper.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Nield

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: But, it is more time consuming to assemble than I would prefer. I'm not saying hours, but I will tell you that you will buy this, put it together once and do everything you can not to put it back into the carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Nice construction. Much better than the plastic version. Biggest issue is it takes forever to take down and put together. Be ready for a 20 minute project.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Shockingly Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Rock-solid construction. Really industrial strength. Enjoyed these at a picnic and several guests commented on how solid and sturdy the set was. I feel like it might actually be overbuilt, and that's the way I like my stuff.
customer_reviews.author: John Booty

customer_reviews.title: Will not break like the cheaper version that we had previously
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Will not break like the cheaper version that we had previously.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Breazeale

customer_reviews.title: Takes a lickin amd keeps on tickin
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good ladder ball set. I like that these are metal. I bought a different set of balls because of other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Amos

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and permanent. Shold last for years.
customer_reviews.text: This one holds up. Sturdy. Takes a beating. No trouble putting it together or fitting the screws. Balls are a little flimsy - prefer the hard rubber type bolos.
customer_reviews.author: Schroedinger's Cat

customer_reviews.title: ... few years ago and it's been a lot of fun. It comes out at most warm weather summer ...
customer_reviews.text: We gave this as a gift a few years ago and it's been a lot of fun. It comes out at most warm weather summer events.
customer_reviews.author: Mother & Manager

customer_reviews.title: I've bought a number of different Ladderball sets
customer_reviews.text: This is the most superior Ladderball set I've seen. I have had some cheaper plastic ones in the past that were broken during play and on beach trips. This one, however, is really well made and is long-lasting. Fun game! I am very pleased with my set.
customer_reviews.author: Trista Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I take this set tailgaitng to football games. I didn't want one of the plastic ones for feat that it would blow away in the meadowlands winds, so I went with metal. It is very well built and fits nicely in the bag it comes with. The only complaint I have is the time it takes to put it together and take it apart can be a hassle sometime.
customer_reviews.author: Ss2

customer_reviews.title: Fun & Solid toy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and we'll made. No missing parts. Has made it through the summer with weekly use (teenagers & adults). We're planning on playing this over Thanksgiving and Christmas, weather permitting.
customer_reviews.author: wmunp

customer_reviews.title: So glad to bought the metal one
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and easy to put together. I keep the vertical portion put together in the base of my trunk so its ready to go at all times. Ladder ball ready to go at any time. I wish this came with the hard bolas but the soft ones are ok. I've even played inside at night with the soft bolas.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Built to last
customer_reviews.text: This is the best built Ladderball game made. It is easy to put together and take apart. Sturdy construction allows for the best playing experience possible. Easy to transport. Best of all it is priced right!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen E. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality construction but needs new Bolas !!!
customer_reviews.text: Quality construction and looks great. However the " bolas " ( golfballs on strings ) are made of soft rubber and not traditional golf balls. They claim they are official size and weight but I will probably be buying a set of new ones. Nice carrying case as well. Takes a little longer to put together considering that the nuts are all hand screw only but much nicer set than any PVC one that I have ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: TheGooniesRules

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy and well made ladderball set. I have used one that was made of plastic which kept falling apart. It was easy to put together and it stays together. Hours of fun playing. Would definitely recommend to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: D B

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these! Super easy to put together, great quality and come with a carrying/storage bag!
customer_reviews.author: MrsNicole

product_meta.title: Maranda Enterprises Metal Ladderball Game
product_meta.description:
Metal Double Ladderball is America's favorite bola game built tough! Metal ladder construction is built to last. You'll have hours of enjoyment playing this easy to learn family game. Desinged for indoor and outdoor play, Metal Double Ladderball is ideal for tailgating, family reunions, parties, camping or the beach. Safe soft plastic bolas are official size and weight to play like real golf balls. For 2 to 4 players. Adult assembly required.

AMAZON.COM
Designed for two to four players, this ladderball game is great whether you're at the beach or in the backyard with friends and family members. Ladderball is a lawn game played by throwing bolas (two balls connected by a string) onto a ladder-shaped upright. Included in this game are two durable, steel goal uprights; three red bolas; three blue bolas; instructions; and a convenient carrying and storage bag. The officially sized bolas are made with safe, soft plastic. Suitable for ages 8 and up, this product is the winner of a Dr. Toy Best Picks award as well as a 2010 Game of the Year award from Creative Child magazine. Assembly is required. 

Manufacturer Warranty
Maranda Enterprises warrants each of its products to be free from manufacturer defects in material and workmanship. Liability under this warranty is limited to replacing products found to be defective within 30 days of the date of purchase. 

What's in the Box
Two steel goal uprights, three red bolas, three blue bolas, carrying bag, and instructions.
feature_bullets: Award-winning LADDERBALL game; designed for two to four players
Includes two DURABLE, steel goal uprights; three red bolas; and three blue bolas
Also comes with convenient CARRYING and STORAGE BAG; bolas are made with soft, safe plastic
Great game for parties, graduation, outdoor activities, team events
ASTM toy safety tested and approved. Suitable for ages 8 and up
